l10n_infotext_nren_adm1.en: Add and delete NREN admins for your NREN

l10n_infotext_selfmarker.en: You yourself are marked with an asterisk (*).

l10n_nren_adm_priv3.en: Give institutions within the NREN's domain access to Confusa

l10n_nren_adm_priv5.en: Change the branding of the portal

l10n_infotext_nren_adm3.en: This role has a large impact on the available power. Thus, you should not grant this level to everybody, but only to persons who you trust implicitly.

l10n_confirm_downgrade_selfn.en: Do you want to downgrade YOURSELF to a subscriber admin?

l10n_confirm_delete_self.en:
You are about to remove YOURSELF!
Are you sure?

l10n_infotext_subs_adm2.en: Subscriber admins have the following privileges:

l10n_subs_adm_priv1.en: Revoke certificates of users of their own institution

l10n_infotext_subs_adm3.en: Their scope is limited to an institution, in this case

l10n_msg_getadms1.en:
Cannot retrieve (nren) admins from database!
Probably wrong syntax for query, ask an admin to investigate. Server said:

l10n_msg_admunique.en: Cannot add a subscriber(sub)-admin since an administrator with that name is already present in the database. Note that an administrator may only exist once, with exactly one admin-level!

l10n_suc_downgrnren.en: Downgraded you to subscriber admin of subscriber with ID

l10n_confirm_downgrsss1.en: Downgrade YOURSELF to subscriber sub-admin status? Are you sure?

l10n_infotext_subss_adm2.en: Subscriber sub-admins have the following privileges:

l10n_infotext_nren_adm4.en: NREN-admins are administrating the whole NREN admin domain, i.e. your institution along with other institutions. They can also define, which institutions are hooked up to Confusa and which credentials should be used for communicating with the Online-CA. Below you can find a list of them along with their e-mail addresses for your NREN

l10n_infotext_subs_adm5.en: The following are the subscriber admins that are administrating your institution (and their names/emails)

l10n_infotext_subss_adm3.en: The following are sub-admins for your insitutions, who, like you, may revoke certificates (and their names/emails):

l10n_nren_cannot_downgrade.en: You cannot downgrade to Subscriber-admin because you do not have the required entitlements set. If you do this, you will lock yourself out of the admin-interface!
